name: Diabolos
startIntroPart2: Let us demonstrate to those who are insolent in their dealings with us that we are not to be underestimated.
declaringWar: I shall rain down punishment on you puny mortals
defeated: Well played, mortal. You may have bested me this time, but remember, the game is never truly over. I’ll be back, and next time, victory will be mine!
introduction: Greetings, mortals. I am Satan, the bringer of Darkness and the ruler of Hell.
tradeRequest: Ready for a Deal with the Devil?
uniques: Can spend Faith to annex or puppet a City-State that has been your ally for [5] turns
